results.title: From the ground up
results.brief_description: A film designed to show Britain’s efforts to expand her productive capacity in industry, farming and all other spheres of her national life. Implicit in the film is the idea that present austerity is essential to future prosperity.

results.title: From the Family into the World
results.brief_description: Early experiences within the home and the kindergarten provide the foundation for children to make a successful transition into the more structured learning environment of the school. This video aims to help parents prepare their children for school life. It starts at kindergarten and broadly examines how the pre-school child develops in a group situation and gives a general approach to their learning needs before starting school.

results.title: From the edge of the city = Apo tin akri tis polis
results.creator_credit: Constantine Giannaris, Anastasios Vasiliou, Dionysis Samiotis, Rosebud Films, Mythos Ltd and Hot Shot
results.brief_description: With the fall of the Soviet Union, Pontians (Greek speaking Russians from former USSR) began to arrive in Greece. “From the edge of the city” examines the lives of these immigrants and their children who live literally at the edge of Athens’s immense urban sprawl. Though proudly Greek in their former country, they find that as immigrants they are considered outsiders by the Greeks. Faced with prejudice, unemployment and the cultural dislocation that comes with being migrants, many of the young Pontians turn increasingly to violence, crime and prostitution to survive. Utilising documentary techniques - hand-held camera, straight-to-camera monologues and interviews - the film examines the life of 17 year old Sasha (Stathis Papadopoulos), the brash fearless leader of a gang who sell drugs and their bodies in Athens’s red-light district behind Ommonia Square. Juxtaposing documentary sequences with dream-like evocations of Sasha’s life in the former USSR, “From the edge of the city” is a kinetic work that paints a bleak portrait of the realities facing immigrants in twenty-first century Europe. In Greek and Russian with English subtitles.
results.title_for_label: From the edge of the city = Apo tin akri tis polis

results.title: From the earth to the moon
results.creator_credit: Michael Bostick, Ron Howard, Brian Grazer, Imagine Entertainment (US) and Clavius Base

results.title: From the bush (A)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “From spirit to spirit (A)”.
Explores how Aboriginal rock and roll singers combine black and white aspects of their life to create music. Living in a desert, they team up with a “whitefella” band and they commence a tour with a difference.

results.title: From the barrel of a gun
results.creator_credit: Steven Talley, Teleac Holland, KCTS (Television station : Seattle, Wash.), Nihon Hoso Kyokai, Jigsaw Productions and PBI Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Pacific century”.
This video looks at how two men - Ho Chi Minh and Sukharno destroyed the myth of western supremacy by tapping into the innate spirit of nationalism which had been repressed in the peoples of Vietnam and Indonesia. The video mixes archival footage, eyewitness accounts and expert commentary to show the roots of the Vietnamese war and the rise of Indonesia as a political power.
